attributes.action: Ensure all ghurkas have the right to settle in Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This decision today is shameful and disrespectful to the many who have represented this country in conflict. They, more than many others have earned the right to settlement and the support of the British people

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
